title: Segtools header should report the number of labels

content.html:
Original [issue 17](https://code.google.com/p/segtools/issues/detail?id=17) created by ericr86 on 2010-10-01T18:11:36.000Z:

The "Segmentation information" section of the report should include a line that says, e.g.,

"Number of labels: 13"

It would probably also be worthwhile to say

"Number of segments: 1,354,801"

And, if it's not too hard to do

"Number of bases: 3,142,512,251"
